name: TabsListPrimitive
description: Container for tab buttons with styling. Renders a `<div>` element.

props.name: activateOnFocus
props.description:
Whether to automatically change the active tab on arrow key focus.
Otherwise, tabs will be activated using <kbd>Enter</kbd> or <kbd>Space</kbd> key press.

props.name: className
props.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

props.name: disabled
props.description:
Whether the Tab is disabled.

If a first Tab on a `<Tabs.List>` is disabled, it won't initially be selected.
Instead, the next enabled Tab will be selected.
However, it does not work like this during server-side rendering, as it is not known
during pre-rendering which Tabs are disabled.
To work around it, ensure that `defaultValue` or `value` on `<Tabs.Root>` is set to an enabled Tab's value.

props.name: loopFocus
props.description:
Whether to loop keyboard focus back to the first item
when the end of the list is reached while using the arrow keys.

props.name: render
props.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.

props.name: orientation
props.description:
Determines the layout direction of the tab list.
Determines the layout direction of the tab button.

props.name: size
props.description: Determines the size of the tab button.

props.name: variant
props.description:
Determines the visual style of the tab list.
Determines the visual style of the tab button.
